CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Source__c , "Facebook") || ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "Advertisement") || ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "website-contact_us") || ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "Google Ads"), "Bucket 1",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "Website") || ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "Landing Page"), "Bucket 2",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "Referral") || ISPICKVAL(Source__c , "Partner"), "Bucket 3",
"Bucket 4" )))
CustomField.label: Source Bucket
